overview: Ange-Marie is a 45 years old fisherman in Cap Corse in Corsica. He lives with his brother and his old mother in a secluded place where women are becoming scarce. One day, on retruning from fishing, Ange-Marie finds himself alone in the "cow beach" and sees three beatiful swimmers. The image of these women then haunts him and draws him out to the sea.
title: O MÀ!
